title: Twitter Payments, Financial Illiteracy, and the Out-of-Touch Elite
summary:
Why does anyone need another form of payment? Who's really behind all that "un-American" content on TikTok? And which Pivot co-host is the most elite? Learn the answers to all that and more as Kara and Scott tackle listener questions.Â Plus: Poetry.
